463410.name: Panic Pump - Can you save them ALL?
463410.description:
Panic Pump

Get ready to dive into an extraordinary universe full of puzzles with Panic Pump, a groundbreaking 3D puzzle game that combines logic, creativity, and strategy into a unique challenge. Embark on a magical adventure to rescue the adorable Bumbi creatures from the clutches of their wicked sibling, tackling complex and dynamic puzzles powered by an advanced hydraulic system called the hydrolock.

A World to Discover

In Panic Pump, the fate of the Bumbi lies in your hands. Explore a vibrant universe filled with dangers, where every level presents a new puzzle to solve. You’ll face clever obstacles, landscapes brimming with deceptive candies, and smoking contraptions as you work to dismantle a hydraulic system designed to test your skills.

You won’t be alone in this mission: choose from a variety of Bumbi heroes, each customizable with accessories and abilities that you unlock as you progress. And just when you think you’ve seen it all, the adventure continues with an integrated level editor, allowing you to create your own puzzles and share them with the community.

Key Features

  • Innovative Puzzles: Use logic and strategy to solve challenges that blend physical interactions with critical thinking.

  • Increasing Complexity: Each level grows more challenging, requiring dexterity and intelligence.

  • Customizable Heroes: Unlock accessories and abilities to make your Bumbi truly unique.

  • Dynamic Worlds: Traverse fantastical landscapes filled with dangers, from ravenous monsters to stormy seas.

  • Level Editor: Unleash your creativity by designing new puzzles and challenging the community.

  • Original Soundtrack: Let yourself be carried away by music and sound effects that enhance the atmosphere.

An Endless Experience

With Panic Pump, every challenge is an opportunity to discover something new and push your limits. Whether you’re exploring the campaign’s levels or creating your own puzzles, the fun never ends.

Don’t wait: add Panic Pump to your Steam library and start your adventure today!
463410.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
